entries.title: New Visual Enhancements
entries.contents:
This release brings new visual improvements and other updates:

  • ADDED: AutoHUD, Legendary Tooltips, Tiny Item Animations, RemoveHUD, BetterFPSRD, Iceberg, Prism & Wakes
  • UPDATED: Cupboard, Voices of Wynn & Wynntils
  • Made the Wynntils Preset Config optional

entries.title: Minor Fix
entries.contents: Fixed a GUI issue caused by Immediately Fast

entries.title: Major Modpack Update
entries.contents:
Major update bringing all modpacks to Minecraft 1.21.4

  • ADDED: Particular & Zoomify
  • UPDATED: Wynntils & Voices of Wynn
  • Updated the Legacy Pack to 1.21

entries.title: Major Modpack Update
entries.contents:
Updated all modpacks to Minecraft 1.21

  • Created a new light-weight modpack: MAJESTIC LITE
  • Created a new beta testing modpack: BETA PACK

entries.title: Initial Release
entries.contents:
First public release of the Wynncraft Overhaul modpack installer! Features include:

  • Easy one-click installation
  • Support for multiple launchers
  • Customizable mod selection
